skills.name: Waning Moon
skills.description: When attacking enemies affected by Time Slow, deal 1,000 Physical DMG and 1,500 Ice DMG to target and nearby enemies. CD: 5.0s.

skills.name: Night Bringer
skills.description: Character gains 15% Physical and Elemental DMG. When deployed, character gains 50% Total DMG Multiplier for 5.0s. This buff triggers once every 30s when the character is deployed. Using the Ultimate skill resets the CD and immediately activates the buff.
